Package value

Class TimeUTCValue

java.lang.Object
value.TimeValue
value.TimeUTCValue
public class TimeUTCValue extends TimeValue
La classe TimeUTCValue gere le temps au format UTC (heure,minute,seconde)
Author:
Lilou Undreiner, Anne Hugo

      Parameters:
